actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A resolution relating to the rail transportation crisis for farmers and shippers of agricultural commodities.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of the House of Representatives that steps should be taken to insure that more efficient use is made of the existing stock of railroad freight cars and power equipment and to encourage the acquisition of new cars and equipment in order to meet the needs of American agriculture.

titles.title: A resolution relating to the rail transportation crisis for farmers and shippers of agricultural commodities.
